server.desc: Run a Local server (uses your cwd as the web root)

serveStatic.desc: Directories to serve static files from

ws.desc: Proxy mode only - enable websocket proxying

browser.desc: Choose which browser should be auto-opened

index.desc: Specify which file should be used as the index page

startPath.desc: Specify the start path for the opened browser

directory.desc: Show a directory listing for the server

open.desc: Choose which URL is auto-opened (local, external or tunnel), or provide a url

cors.desc: Add Access Control headers to every request

config.desc: Specify a path to a configuration file

logLevel.desc: Set the logger output level (silent, info or debug)

reload-delay.desc: Time in milliseconds to delay the reload event following file changes

reload-debounce.desc: Restrict the frequency in which browser:reload events can be emitted to connected clients

ui-port.desc: Specify a port for the UI to use

watchEvents.desc: Specify which file events to respond to

no-notify.desc: Disable the notify element in browsers

no-open.desc: Don't open a new browser window

no-reload-on-restart.desc: Don't auto-reload all browsers following a restart
